title: Interpretation of seeing a white dress in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a white dress in a dream by Ibn SirinInterpretation of seeing a white dress in a dream by Ibn Sirin, who explained it as acquiring a lot of incoming money and extreme wealth, if the white dress was made of pure wool. This is also a vision that suggests a beautiful world, like the color white, characterized by joy and pleasure. It also shows a good and friendly husband, an ideal married life and getting rid of the difficulties facing the family. Ibn Sirin explained that losing a white dress in a vision, and always dreaming of searching for it indicates mental distraction and wrong thinking, and if you find it, but it is in a threadbare or impure state, then this indicates difficulties. life. Many worries and distress afflict the home, but it approaches destruction, God willing. Interpretation of seeing a white dress for single women. Interpretation of seeing a white dress for an unmarried woman, which indicates the uprightness of her religion, world, and good morals. When an unmarried woman sees that she is wearing a white dress, this may indicate a good marriage that will bring She will have joy and happiness, God willing. If the vision was during or before her engagement period, this indicates the difficulties she faces at this stage, even if she has a close relationship with the groom. He knows better. If the unmarried woman is young and not in the stage of engagement or marriage, explain success in life or the arrival of good news and good skin associated with commitment, hijab, and good treatment. Interpretation of seeing a white dress for a married woman. Interpretation of seeing a white dress for a married woman means justice in marital life, covering and comfort. Physical, and this vision shows the end of worries, the alleviation of life’s difficulties, an increase in the wife’s love, the strength of the marital relationship, and the affection between the spouses. When a married woman is in love with the color white and is strongly attached to it, this indicates in this case the mood of the psychological state she is going through at the time. Current. Sometimes, the white dress indicates joy and happiness, and hearing happy pregnancy news, if she is not pregnant, and it may indicate the marriage of a relative, such as a brother or sister. Interpretation of seeing a white dress for a pregnant womanInterpretation of seeing a white dress for a pregnant woman indicates the completion of the difficulties of pregnancy and childbirth , the correct series, the nearness of her due date, and safety for her and the baby. This vision does not specify a specific type of fetus, but it shows the satisfaction of her desire regarding the type of fetus, and if she wants a boy for herself, and if she wants a girl, she will get it, and God knows best. Don’t forget to share the article on the social media pages. If you have any question or question about a vision that you would like to know its interpretation, do not hesitate to ask your question. We also invite you to follow our pages on social networking sites, Facebook, Twitter, and others, and we will meet you in a new article. Until this date, we leave you, may God protect you and take care of you as long as you are well, my dear, in God’s name.

title: Interpretation of a dream about having teeth in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Seeing a hole between the teeth and a fracture in the scattered teeth of an unmarried girl, for a married woman, for a pregnant woman, for a divorced woman, for a man, either the white front part, a dream of cracked teeth, darkening of the teeth by Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, Imam Al-Sadiq, and more explanations in the topic appendix below. Grinding teeth in a dream or scattering. Teeth in a dream are among the frightening dreams in a dream, which afflict the dreamer with a lot of fear and terror due to the wrong interpretations that prevailed in all interpretations in the past. The presence of a hole in the teeth is one of the dreams that carries many important meanings, signs, and connotations that come to the dreamer and that We must be careful about it, as it is one of the dreams that you see often in life. Interpretation of a gap on the teeth in a dream: Whoever sees a gap in his teeth, this is the fault of his family. Perhaps this indicates an increase in beauty, and grinding teeth is evidence of discord among his household. Uneven teeth indicate that you are spending money on denying worries. White, long, and perfect teeth are an increase in strength and prestige. It is said that the falaj al-Sunnah was a beautiful greeting to his home. Falling teeth in a dream indicates a quarrel. Between the parents, if the fall reduces the jaw, but if the fall is natural, it is food, God willing, for the family. Also, the spacing between the front teeth (cleavage) is Masoud and Marzouq with Hassan. Seeing the fall between the teeth indicates the abundance of food, the death of worry and anxiety, and the transformation of sadness into joy and happiness. Whoever dreams of his tooth falling out, this indicates goodness and beauty. Falagia on the teeth is a sign of beauty for many. Interpretation of falagia on the teeth in a dream for a single woman. False teeth in an unmarried woman’s dream means a close relationship, marriage, and distance from religion. Interpretation of falagia on the teeth in a dream for a married woman. Seeing the front teeth scattered in a dream or the tops of the teeth in an unmarried woman’s dream means problems. A family from which the family will suffer. Interpretation of a dental flotation in a dream for a pregnant woman. Seeing a dental phallus in a pregnant woman’s dream means that the fetus will be extremely beautiful and will have a high moral character and will come with great strength, God willing. Interpretation of a dental phallus in a dream for a man. Seeing a dental phallus in a man’s dream indicates On defects in the family, such as bad morals or suffering from internal problems within the family itself. The great imam and translator Ibn Sirin explained in his books and interpretations the meaning of seeing dental metal in a dream, with many important meanings and connotations that must be known and the complete interpretation of the person who received it. Interpretation Seeing a falaj tooth in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Seeing teeth in a dream is evidence of family and relatives. Seeing the upper part of teeth in a dream is a sign of a man. Seeing the bottom of teeth in a dream is a sign of a woman. Seeing a tusk in a dream is evidence of the superiority of the people of a visionary household. Seeing a representative The upper right one in a dream is evidence that the boy is taking his father’s place in reality. Seeing teeth in a human dream is evidence of the dreamer’s age. Visions

title: Interpretation of mint in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: What does green mint mean for a married woman? It indicates a calm and stable life. The purpose of eating wet mint? It symbolizes the loss of pain and fatigue that the girl feels. What is the purpose of buying mint? It indicates the recovery of the economic situation. What is the benefit of taking dead mint from the fortune teller? Specify the exit from work. Interpretation of seeing green mint in a dream for a married woman Seeing green mint in a married woman's dream indicates a calm and stable life. If a woman quarrels with someone close to her, seeing it portends the end of the argument and the return of relations to normal. While symbolizing seeing washing it in a dream The problem is gone. The vision also shows her elegant style of speech that positively affects others. The vision also shows that the woman enjoys the love and respect of others. Seeing green mint on the dining table in a dream indicates the money that a woman earns without effort. The vision portends the presence of a new professional opportunity that you must take advantage of to reach the ambition you want to achieve. Buying it in a dream It indicates the ease with which a woman can reach her goals and aspirations. If the woman has debts, the vision also indicates paying off the debt and disposing of burdens. Wearing a wreath From mint on her head, it shows the coming happiness of a woman's life and also shows the woman's victory over her enemies. The vision also portends a woman's traveler to perform the Hajj or Umrah. Interpretation of seeing mint in a dream for a single woman Drinking mint with a cup of tea in a single woman's dream indicates the maturity of her personality and thinking. The vision symbolizes a change in the state of hardship to relaxation. The smell of mint in a dream indicates the girl's self-confidence, as well as her self-confidence. Eating soaked mint in a dream symbolizes the death of the pain and exhaustion that the girl feels. The vision shows the girl's success in work and her obtaining a distinguished position in a short time. Receiving it in a dream means an improvement in the psychological and material condition. Seeing the green color in a dream indicates a relationship with a good young man who appreciates her and respects her feelings and personality and helps her succeed. Interpretation of seeing mint in a dream Picking mint in a married woman's dream indicates her tolerant personality with others. It also indicates the happy life she lives with her partner. The vision symbolizes the dreamer's religiosity and that he is a person with character. Finding difficulty in picking mint or seeing thorns with it indicates Negative damage to him. The vision indicates reaping good and getting a lot to live on. The vision expresses the good relationship between the visionary and others. What is the interpretation of Ibn Sirin's dream of mint? The answer to the question of interpreting the dream of mint Interpretation of dreams Mint in a dream is a sign of kindness and blessing. Mint in a dream can be a sign of a change in circumstances for the better. Yellow mint in a dream can be an indication of the hardships and problems that the dreamer is going through. If you see rotten mint in a dream, this is a sign of sadness. If one sees in a dream that he is buying mint, then

title: Interpretation of seeing praise in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing praise in a dream The science of dream interpretation is considered one of the complex sciences in analyzing the symbols that the dreamer sees in a dream and may include symbols that have a special meaning to the dreamer, whether they are praiseworthy or unpleasant, or do not include any meaning for the dreamer and are therefore pipe dreams. The matter varies depending on the situation, but ultimately interpretations of dreams represent the jurisprudence of scholars and what is not seen but only God knows.Interpretation of seeing praise in a dreamIbn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing praise in a dreamIbn Sirin showed that hearing praise in a dream indicates that the dreamer will gain the admiration of others for the work he has done In fact, seeing praise in a dream indicates that the dreamer enjoys loving people with good behavior. Seeing praise in a dream is one of the visions that indicate goodness and abundant livelihood for the dreamer. If the dreamer is shy when hearing praise in the dream, this reflects the extent to which He is humble in reality and has good morals. If the fortuneteller ignores praise in a dream, this indicates his arrogance and arrogance in reality. But if the dreamer feels proud when he hears praise in the dream, then this indicates in its meaning the abundance of goodness and abundance of livelihood. Hearing a lot of praise in a dream indicates To the high status that the dreamer enjoys in reality. If the dreamer sees in a dream that his mother is praising him, this indicates his mother’s satisfaction with him. If the father’s praise is heard in the dream, this indicates the dreamer’s superiority in reality. As for praising friends in the dream, it means It symbolizes the dreamer’s loyalty to them, while praising neighbors in a dream indicates that the dreamer does not like to interfere in the private lives of others. Seeing someone who complements me in a single woman’s dream. A dream about praising an unmarried girl indicates a stable life that she enjoys. But if the praise is due to the dreamer’s beauty, This indicates the good behavior that he enjoys among people. If she hears praise in her clothes, this indicates that she enjoys protection in reality, and God knows best. If a single woman sees in a dream that she is praising her manager at work, this indicates the achievement of her goals. And in the case of dreaming of a woman he knows The dreamer praises her, this indicates the benefit that the woman gets from the person who had the vision, and God knows best. If a single woman dreams that her father praises her mother, this indicates how hard she works. If an unmarried woman dreams of hearing praise for the beauty of her eyes from someone she knows, this indicates The extent of her appreciation for that person. Praise in a dream for a married woman. When a married woman hears praise in a dream, this reflects her stable marital life and her happiness with her husband. If she hears praise from the husband, this indicates the husband’s good treatment of him and the absence of faults with him, and if he praises her beauty, this indicates The intensity of his love for her. In the event that you receive praise from the husband’s mother in a dream, this indicates that the husband’s mother is satisfied with her. In the event that a married woman praises her boss at work, the vision indicates that the woman in the vision will reach a high position. If the dreamer sees in a dream She complements her husband's clothes, so this is...

title: I dreamed that I killed someone

preview.html: I dreamed that I killed someone in a dream by seeing the website roy2a.com. Murder causes the end of a person’s life, intentionally or unintentionally. Murder is considered one of the most heinous crimes, especially if it was premeditated murder. So today from this article we will present to youI dreamed That I killed a person. According to the great translators such as Ibn Sirin, Ibn Kathir, and other scholars of dream interpretation, follow us according to the status of the dreamer, whether he is single, married, or pregnant. I dreamed that I killed a person for the sake of Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin interprets the vision of killing a person in a dream. It indicates the emergence of promising things in life. The dreamer. Seeing success in killing someone in a dream. It indicates achieving something in the dreamer’s life that he has been struggling for for a long time. Facing obstacles while killing in a dream. It indicates that the dreamer will face many obstacles in his life while striving to achieve his goals and ambitions. Repeating the vision. Murder in a dream: It indicates that the dreamer has gone through many failures in his life, and this causes him a lot of sadness and anxiety. See another interpretation: Interpretation of seeing mice being killed in a dream. I dreamed that I killed a person by Ibn Shahin. Ibn Shaheen’s interpretation of seeing a person being killed without cutting off a limb in a dream indicates that There will be a mutually beneficial relationship between the monarch and this person. Seeing a dead person and shedding their blood in a dream indicates that the dreamer will obtain huge amounts of money in the coming period, and God knows best. Killing a son in a dream indicates that God will bless the dreamer with a lot of lawful food. See another interpretation: Interpretation of a vision I killed someone. I dreamed that I killed someone for the sake of Nabulsi. Nabulsi will interpret the vision of killing a person in a dream. It indicates that the dreamer has committed a great sin in his life, and God knows best. Seeing the dreamer committing suicide in a dream indicates the dreamer’s return to God and his sincere repentance. Killing an unknown person in a dream. It appears that the fortuneteller is far away. Seeing an unmarried woman killed A man in a dream means that she will meet a good young man and they will have a strong emotional relationship that will end in marriage. Killing someone in self-defense in a single woman’s dream indicates the approaching date of her wedding, and God knows best. I dreamed that I killed a married woman. Seeing a married woman killing her husband in a dream shows the amount of love, affection and compassion that she has towards Her husband. Killing the husband in a married woman’s dream may also indicate that God will get her pregnant soon, and God knows best. I dreamed that I killed a pregnant woman. Seeing a pregnant woman killing someone in a dream says that she will go through a smooth and easy birth process without feeling any pain or fatigue and she and her child will be in good health. Killing the husband in A dream about a pregnant woman indicates that she will give birth to a girl, and God knows best. See another interpretation: Interpretation of seeing someone trying to kill me in a dream. We are happy to see the reception of your dreams about “seeing someone being killed” through...

title: Interpretation of a dream about a man drinking his wife’s milk in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams of a man drinking his wife’s milk in a dream. Some people want to know the interpretation of a dream of a man drinking his wife’s milk in a dream. Therefore, you should be careful and not completely believe in these interpretations. Interpretation of a dream about a man drinking his wife’s milk in a dream. If one sees that the husband is drinking his wife’s milk in a dream, this may indicate the abundant sustenance that the husband may get in those days. It may indicate that the husband is drinking his wife’s milk in a dream. His wife’s milk in a dream indicates a great benefit that the husband can obtain from his wife at that time. It is possible to see a man eating his wife’s milk in a dream indicates a large inheritance that the wife may obtain in those days, thanks to God. It is possible to see a husband eating his wife’s milk in a dream. If you see your husband eating burnt food, this may indicate that he has been betrayed or cheated by someone. Burned, this may indicate his inability to achieve his goals and aspirations, thanks to God. Seeing one’s wife eating burnt food in a dream may indicate some financial problems that he may face in his life during this period. Dreaming of eating burnt food at a wedding in a dream may indicate some The problems and crises that existed between them at that time, and God knows best. title: Interpretation of seeing my brother’s friend in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing my brother’s friend in a dream for a single woman: If a girl sees the vision of her brother’s friend in a dream, and she has feelings of admiration for him in reality, then this is a sign of her desire to communicate with him. This vision also shows the girl’s desire to strengthen the relationship between her brother and this young man. And if that young man is a friend Her brother: In reality, seeing him in a dream reflects the girl’s desire to keep this young man away from her brother and their lives. If an unmarried girl sees her brother’s friend sitting in her house in her dream, this is evidence of the trust of the people of the house in this young man. But if an unmarried girl dreams that she sees this young man Her brother’s friend is on the street. Then they continue the road together, as this is a sign of their connection and marriage in reality. But if this encounter is fleeting and then they both go their separate ways, their connection will not be completed unfortunately. Interpretation of seeing my brother’s friend in a dream about a married woman. Seeing my brother’s friend in a dream of a married woman, It shows the woman with the vision trying to get close to her brother and hold him in a special way. If the brother is an introvert and does not have many friends. If the brother is big and responsible for himself, then the woman seeing his friend in a dream is a sign that the person with the vision is worried about her brother’s future. And he wants to get married and find On a good woman. What if a married woman sees in her dream her brother’s friend attacking her house and breaking into her house? This is a sign that this friend is causing a lot of trouble for the woman she sees in front of her husband and children. But if a married woman sees in her dream that her brother’s friend is sitting in her house and crying, then this A sign that her brother is going through a crisis and severe distress and needs her help. There is another interpretation by one of the interpreters that says that if a married woman sees in her dream that her brother’s friend has brought her a gift, then this is a sign that she will become pregnant. And that if the gift is open, this is a sign of She is pregnant with a son. If the gift is closed, it is a sign that she is pregnant with the girl, and God knows best. I dreamed that my brother’s friend loves me. If the girl sees her brother’s friend in a dream and there are clear feelings of love between them in the vision, then this is a sign of their imminent marriage. The repetition of this vision indicates that the girl is in The vision praises this young man and wants to get involved with him because of her strong admiration for him. He dreams of my brother’s friend proposing to me. Perhaps this vision indicates that the girl’s mind is preoccupied with the issue of her marriage in reality. If there is mutual admiration between the girl and the young man who is her brother’s friend, in the dream it is a sign of his closeness, and God knows best. Interpretation of the vision of my brother In a dream for a single woman, seeing an unmarried brother in a dream indicates that the girl is going through a period of stability and happiness. This vision shows the ability of this visionary girl to achieve her goals and aspirations in life. It also indicates the existence of a strong relationship between the visionary and her brother. It indicates the disappearance of heartache and crises. Of their lives.Interpretation of seeing an old friend in a dream for a single woman. If a free girl sees in her dream, an old friend smiling at her, this is a sign that she will soon hear good and happy news. But if a single girl sees

title: Interpretation of seeing doves in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Seeing bathrooms in one’s dreams has many meanings and interpretations for those who dream of them, and in the following article we will learn about the most important interpretations of scholars on this subject. Let us read the following to learn about the meaning of this dream. Seeing bathrooms in a dream. Seeing public bathrooms in a dream is evidence that he is surrounded by completely inappropriate company. It urges him to commit vices and immorality. If someone dreams of a bathroom that is not clean at all, this is a sign that he is talking badly about others behind their backs and he should stop doing so so as not to alienate everyone around him. In the event that the dreamer witnesses during his sleep entering the bathroom This expresses the many problems he is suffering from at that time. Seeing the dreamer in his dream entering the bathroom and bathing with hot water is a sign of escalating difficulties and increasing anxiety for him. Seeing baths in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin interprets the dreamer’s dream of bathing as a sign that he has committed many sins. Wrong and shameful actions and he must stop them immediately before they cause his death. If a person sees in his dream that he is going to the toilet, this is a sign of his straying from the path of God (the Most High) and not performing his duties on time. This matter is unacceptable and he should reconsider himself. . Immediately.Interpretation of seeing public baths in a dream by Ibn Sirin. A man’s dream in a public bath, according to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation, is evidence that he obtains his money from illegal sources, and if his relationship with it is revealed, he will find himself in a very dangerous situation. The dream of public baths It was very dirty symbolizing the many temptations surrounding him and his inability to ignore them and indulge in them. Seeing bathrooms in a single woman’s dream An unmarried woman who dreams of bathing in a bathroom indicates that she has received an offer of marriage from a good man who cares about her comfort and the fulfillment of all her desires, and she will be very happy in the future. Her life with him. If the dreamer sees a dove during her sleep, this indicates that there are many changes that will occur in her life in the coming days and they will be very satisfying for her. If the dreamer sees a dove in her dream, this means that she will be able to achieve many things that she dreamed of. By achieving it for a long time. Seeing a girl in the bathroom in her dream who was a student symbolizes that she will achieve the highest grades at the end of the school year exams and her family will be very proud of her. Interpretation of dreams of entering the bathroom for single women. Seeing an unmarried woman in a dream because she is entering the bathroom means that she has committed many abominations and abominations. , without fearing her Creator or remembering what she will get in return for these actions. If the dreamer sees during her sleep that she is entering the bathroom singing, this is a sign that she is performing many shameful acts, despite knowing the consequences, but she does not care. If the dreamer dreams that she is entering the bathroom She uses hot water, as this symbolizes that something will happen soon in her life that will change the course of things and make her more mature. Seeing a girl entering the bathroom in her dream symbolizes the presence of a young man who has...

title: What is the interpretation of a dream about a yellow snake for a woman married to Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a yellow snake for a married woman: The presence of snakes in a person’s dream is certainly bad, even if it does not carry clear evidence that can be seen in the person’s life to clarify what is inside it or the messages it conveys. As soon as he sees a snake in a dream, a person knows that something bad will happen to him in the next few days or that something bad will happen to his family. Interpretation of a dream of a yellow snake for a married woman, by Ibn SirinInterpretation of a dream of a yellow snake for a married womanThe yellow snake in a dream of a married woman is a sign of crises of all kinds, But the most important of them is the presence of health crises that will afflict her. When a married woman sees a yellow snake in her dream, and this snake wrapped itself around a part of her body and she was unable to move it away, the meaning of the dream interpretation indicates that the dreamer is afflicted with a disease in the part that the snake wraps around in the dream. If a married woman sees that her husband is far away from her, and a yellow snake appears around him, and she is uncomfortable with this dream, then its interpretation is that there is another bad-behaved woman who wants to surround her husband and kill him. Stay away from her and her children, and the dream carries a warning message for her. If the yellow snake is present near one of the married woman’s sons in the dream, then she must take care of this son, because something bad may happen to him in the period that follows this dream. Interpretation of a dream about a yellow snake for a married woman, for a son SirinThe opinion of the scholar Ibn Sirin could be similar to many interpretations of the dream of seeing a yellow snake in a married woman’s dream, which expresses the presence of crises surrounding the visions, which in most estimates are health crises that she will suffer from for some time. The yellow snake in a married woman’s dream is a sign On poverty and poor financial conditions for her and her family. She may suffer from debts or the husband may face situations that prevent him from doing the work that earns him a living. The yellow color of the snake in a married woman’s dream also has a special meaning, as it means the continuation and severity of crises for long periods of time. There may already be crises between the dreamer and her husband, and the interpretation of this dream for her carries a bad omen that the problems she is experiencing with her husband will continue. Also, the yellow snake in the visionary’s dream can express the presence of a woman who is jealous of him for the source of livelihood he is gaining. Interpretation of a dream about a snake Yellow for a pregnant woman: In the interpretation of a yellow snake for a pregnant woman, there are many interpretations that do not bode well for the dreamer. Seeing a yellow snake in a dream for her could be a sign that there is someone hiding inside of her who wants harm while she is around. According to another interpretation, the snake in a dream For a pregnant woman, it is a sign that she must be careful because her fetus is in danger or that her pregnancy will not go well because there are health crises that she is going through, or because someone is cheating on her and only wants to hurt her. The yellow snake also has a special meaning regarding betrayal in a pregnant woman’s dream or Married women in general. It may be an indication of the husband’s inclination towards the other as a result of a lack of insight into his marital rights during pregnancy. Egypt website

title: Interpretation of seeing pomegranates in a dream for a single and married woman

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing pomegranates in a dream by Al-Osaimi is one of the most important dreams that many people search for. Pomegranates have always been one of the most beloved fruits for many, but does seeing them in a dream mean something worthy of praise? Especially since the interpretation of a dream may differ from one case to another, so through the session platform we will explain the interpretation of seeing a pomegranate in a dream according to Al-Osaimi. The most prominent interpretations of seeing a pomegranate for a single woman in a dream Al-Osaimi. When discussing the interpretation of seeing a pomegranate fruit in a dream, Al-Osaimi suggested several different indicators that can be clarified as follows. :Seeing eating pomegranate peel in a girl’s dream symbolizes separation and pain, and it is said that it is failure and suffering for any person. The meaning of eating fresh pomegranate in a girl’s dream indicates increased livelihood, happiness, and achieving what the girl wants in life. If you see a sour or spoiled pomegranate in a girl’s dream, this It indicates anxiety, sadness and obstacles in the house that you see. Al-Osaimi explained that eating pomegranates in a dream indicates the abundance of money and what is lawful for the dreamer. Seeing unmarried women buying pomegranates means success and increasing livelihoods at work and in life in general. Seeing the pomegranate fruit is promising and not a good dream to tell If a sick unmarried woman sees that she is eating pomegranate peel in a dream, this indicates recovery from the disease, God willing. Eating food in a dream with a sweet and delicious taste indicates halal money that the dreamer earns. Interpretation of seeing pomegranates in a dream for a married woman states that a married woman’s dreams can It is a reflection of her life, her marital relationship, and the circumstances of her children, and with regard to this dream, Al-Usaimi interpreted it as follows: The jurist Sheikh Al-Usaimi explained seeing pomegranates in a dream with different meanings determined by what we see in the dream. Fresh pomegranates symbolize money, goodness, and happiness, and God knows best. Al-Osaimi’s group of pomegranates was also interpreted according to work, career advancement, living space, and an increase in goodness and money, and it was said that it is beauty for women. Buying pomegranates in a dream symbolizes the arrival of lawful money without pain or fatigue for the one who sees it, a male. Whether or not female. Seeing pomegranate peels in a married woman’s dream indicates financial crises, suffering, and obstacles in life. It is said to be a lack of kindness, distress, and fears that the woman suffers from. Seeing one selling pomegranates in a woman’s dream means separation, quarrels in the home and family, sadness, and loss. Money, and distress for those who see it.Read more: Interpretation of seeing spices in a dreamInterpretation of seeing pomegranates in a dream for a manThe interpretation of this dream according to the significance of Imam Al-Usaimi was as follows: Eating sweet pomegranates in a dream indicates the arrival of money and lawful profit without suffering or exhaustion for the man. It is said that success And happiness in life, and planting a pomegranate fruit in a man’s dream symbolizes an increase in earnings and profits. It is said that it is good relations between parents and good offspring for those who see it. And picking a pomegranate fruit in a dream indicates that a person has money and a large profit without effort, in addition to status and prestige for those who see it. Eat the peel
